propertySearch.title: Property Search
propertySearch.noAccess: You don't have access to this section
propertySearch.lowConfidenceDescription: AI is not fully confident in interpreting your query.
propertySearch.lowConfidenceRecommendation: We recommend clarifying search parameters or viewing detailed interpretation.
propertySearch.startDialogWithAI: Start dialog with AI for property search
propertySearch.aiSearchDescription: Describe what you're looking for in your own words. AI will help find the perfect option.
propertySearch.clientAgentDescription: Communicate with client through AI agent. It will answer questions and select options.
propertySearch.searchPlaceholder: For example: 2-bedroom apartment in Kamala area, budget up to 100k baht, check-in December 15 for a month

advancedSearch.searchBelowMax: Search for cheaper or equal to budget
advancedSearch.toleranceTooltip: Tolerance allows searching for properties within ¬±N days
advancedSearch.searchWithinDays: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Search within ¬±{{days}} days from specified dates
advancedSearch.nightsTooltip: How many nights do you want to stay
advancedSearch.searchWindowTooltip: In which period to search for available dates
advancedSearch.searchingNights: ‚úÖ Searching for {{duration}} available nights in specified period
advancedSearch.clickInstruction: Click once for desired, twice for required
advancedSearch.ownershipInfo: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Freehold - full ownership forever. Leasehold - long-term lease (usually 30-90 years). Company - ownership through Thai company.

aiDescriptionGenerator.title: AI Description Generation
aiDescriptionGenerator.conditionsNotMet: Not all conditions for generation are met
aiDescriptionGenerator.pleaseWait: Please wait {{minutes}} more minutes before regeneration
aiDescriptionGenerator.featuresAdded: These features were automatically added to the property.
aiDescriptionGenerator.uploadPhotos: Upload at least 12 photos (preferably from different categories)
aiDescriptionGenerator.tipDescription: The more data you enter about the property, the better the description will be.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalRequirementsDescription: You can specify additional requirements for description generation. This is not mandatory - description will be generated without them.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalPromptPlaceholder: For example: Mention proximity to school, emphasize family-friendly neighborhood, add information about long-term rental possibility...
aiDescriptionGenerator.requirementsNote: These requirements will be added to the main prompt and considered during description generation.

aiInterpretationModal.title: Detailed AI Interpretation
aiInterpretationModal.mediumAccuracyWarning: Medium accuracy - we recommend checking parameters
aiInterpretationModal.mediumAccuracyDescription: AI is not fully confident in interpreting your query. Please check extracted parameters and clarify query if necessary.
aiInterpretationModal.noParametersDescription: AI could not extract specific parameters from your query. Try clarifying the query or use advanced search.

aiPropertyCreation.title: Create Property with AI
aiPropertyCreation.alternativeOption: If the problem persists, create property without photos and upload them later manually.
aiPropertyCreation.howItWorksDescription: Simply paste text description of the property, and AI will automatically extract all data:
aiPropertyCreation.placeholder:
For example:

Property Anchan Flora, number 55. Sale price 55 million, rent 200k from January to March, rest of time 300k, annual contract 150k. 2 floors, 500 sq inside, 1000 non-residential, 1200 plot. Freehold. Pets allowed, Bangtao area, 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, 2 parking spaces.

Features: kitchen, TV, internet, pool, garden. Sea view.

Occupancy: from December 15 to February 5 occupied.

Google Maps link: https://maps.app.goo.gl/example
Photos: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/example
Owner: Anna, tel +66123456789
aiPropertyCreation.importantDescription: After AI generation, all form fields will be filled. Be sure to check correctness of all data before saving property!

aiResponseViewer.title: AI Assistant Response
aiResponseViewer.flexibleSearchDesc: Searching for {{duration}} nights in period from {{start}} to {{end}}
aiResponseViewer.lowConfidenceDescription: We recommend clarifying search parameters for more accurate results

calendarManager.title: Occupancy Management
calendarManager.noExternalCalendarsDesc: Add .ics links from Booking, Airbnb, Agoda and other services for automatic synchronization
calendarManager.deleteCalendarDesc: Do you want to delete occupancy dates from this calendar?
calendarManager.icsCreatedAfter: After creating property, .ics file with blocked dates will be automatically created.
calendarManager.periodHasOccupied: Selected period already has {{count}} occupied date
calendarManager.periodHasOccupied_plural: Selected period already has {{count}} occupied dates
calendarManager.selectOtherPeriod: Select another period or force add, replacing old dates
calendarManager.reasonPlaceholder: Blocking reason (e.g.: Booked, Maintenance, Personal use)
calendarManager.infoDescription: Each date in selected period will be blocked separately. After adding, .ics file will be automatically updated.
calendarManager.forceAddDescription: If you continue, old dates will be deleted and replaced with new period. This action cannot be undone!
calendarManager.areYouSure: Are you sure about this action?
calendarManager.actionWarning: This may affect the system and it's better not to do this. Action cannot be rolled back!
calendarManager.externalCalendarInfo: After adding calendar, it will be automatically synchronized every 15 minutes. You can enable or disable sync at any time.
calendarManager.noConflictsDesc: All calendars have unique dates. Safe to continue sync.
calendarManager.conflictsDetectedDesc: Following dates are present in multiple calendars simultaneously. Check information before sync.
calendarManager.syncStep1: All dates from enabled calendars will be merged
calendarManager.syncStep2: On conflict, description from first calendar will be used
calendarManager.syncStep3: Single .ics file for export will be created
calendarManager.syncStep4: Sync will happen automatically every 15 minutes
calendarManager.datesAddedTemporarily: Added {{count}} dates. They will be saved after creating property.
calendarManager.datesRemovedTemporarily: Dates successfully removed from temporary list
calendarManager.minTwoCalendars: Need to add at least 2 calendars for analysis
calendarManager.noCalendarDataDesc: Calendar not synced or no blocked dates

mapSearchModal.title: Map Search
mapSearchModal.description: Select search zone center on map and specify radius:

monthlyPricing.title: Monthly Rental Prices
monthlyPricing.infoDescription: Specify rental cost for each month. These prices will be used for long-term rental. Leave field empty if price for month is not needed.
monthlyPricing.importantInfoDescription: Monthly prices have priority over seasonal prices when calculating long-term rental. If price for month is not specified, seasonal price will be used (if available).

photosUploader.uploadInfoCreating: Photos will be uploaded after saving property. Maximum file size: 50MB
photosUploader.uploadPhotosInstruction: Upload photos by selecting category above
photosUploader.removeBedroomConfirm: Bedroom {{number}} has {{count}} photos. All photos will be deleted.
photosUploader.photosAddedTemp: Added {{count}} photos. They will be uploaded after saving property.

searchHistory.performFirstSearch: Perform first search and it will appear here

searchResults.priceOnRequestDescription: For this property prices need to be clarified with manager
searchResults.noPricesDescription: No price data filled in database for this property
searchResults.noCalendarDescription: Property shown as available, but occupancy needs to be clarified with manager
searchResults.noPeriodsAvailable: Unfortunately, no available periods for specified number of nights
searchResults.foundPeriods: Found {{count}} available periods. Periods sorted by price (from cheap to expensive).

translationsEditor.propertyNameInfoDescription: Property name is specified once in 'Basic Information' tab and automatically applied to all languages. Only descriptions are edited here.

accounts.title: Information
accounts.description: To create requests through bot, need to add at least one active Telegram account. After adding, click 'Synchronize' to authorize.

groups.title: How to get Chat ID?
groups.description:
1. Add bot to group
2. Write any message in group
3. Use special bots (e.g. @getidsbot) to get Chat ID

users.title: Information
users.description: Only users from this list can use bot. Telegram ID can be found via @userinfobot

adminChat.notConfiguredDescription: Configure admin chat to receive notifications about request actions

errors.roleUsedByOther: Role "{{role}}" already used by another signer. Choose another role.
